snippet: The head of Iran’s nuclear energy program said in Japan that the nation has started decommissioning the first of thousands of centrifuges used for enriching uranium.
abstract: Iran begins deactivating first group of centrifuges used for enriching uranium as part of nuclear deal reached with global powers in July.
lead_paragraph: The head of Iran’s nuclear energy program said in Japan that the nation has started decommissioning the first of thousands of centrifuges used for enriching uranium.

headline.main: Iran Begins Deactivating Centrifuges Under Nuclear Deal’s Terms
headline.print_headline: Iran Begins Deactivating First Group of Centrifuges
